a.span: PD & Common Core Websites for Teachers

li.a: Learn How to Register for Parentsquare

div.h2:
King City Union School District is a Distance Learning District
Our Digital Schools will be open on April 6, 2020
​
King City Union School District es un distrito de educación a distancia. Nuestra escuela digital abrirá el 6 de abril de 2020.

a.span: Información en línea para padres de CPMS

div.br:
We will continue to distributing Chromebooks and/ or replace and fix Chromebooks already distributed on Wednesday's at the King City Arts Magnet Campus from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. on a walk in basis. Chromebooks distribution is for any student enrolled in a KCUSD school.
Continuaremos distribuyendo Chromebooks y / o reemplazaremos y arreglaremos Chromebooks ya distribuidos el miércoles en el King City Arts Magnet Campus de 10:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m. en una caminata en la base. La distribución de Chromebooks es para cualquier estudiante matriculado en una escuela de KCUSD.

td.div:
We have received information from the State Superintendent of Schools Tony Thurmond as well as our Governor Gavin Newsom, that they do not foresee schools in California returning to regular classroom instruction for the remainder of this school year. While these actions remove students and teachers from our buildings, please know that school is not out. We will continue to educate our students through distance learning packets and online instruction.
Please do not work from home to the point of stress and worry. For example, spending 6 hours per day on technology to do distance learning is too much. We do not expect our students to complete coursework in the same way they would at school. If you have concerns, please contact your teacher or your principal.
Like everything else related to this crisis, our distance learning will remain flexible and subject to change. We all have a role to play in keeping our community’s children engaged and learning.

Hemos recibido información del Superintendente de Escuelas del Estado Tony Thurmond, así como de nuestro Gobernador Gavin Newsom, de que no prevén que las escuelas en California regresen a la instrucción regular en el aula durante el resto de este año escolar. Si bien estas acciones eliminan a los estudiantes y maestros de nuestros edificios, sepa que la escuela no está cerrada. Continuaremos educando a nuestros estudiantes a través de paquetes de aprendizaje a distancia e instrucción en línea.
no trabajen desde casa hasta el punto de estrés y preocupación. Por ejemplo, pasar 6 horas por día en tecnología para aprender a distancia es demasiado. No esperamos que nuestros estudiantes completen los cursos de la misma manera que lo harían en la escuela. Si tiene inquietudes, comuníquese con su maestro o su director.
Como todo lo demás relacionado con esta crisis, nuestro aprendizaje a distancia seguirá siendo flexible y estará sujeto a cambios. Todos tenemos un papel que desempeñar para mantener a los niños de nuestra comunidad comprometidos y aprendiendo.
​

td.h2:
Our Staff Pulling Together to Meet the Needs of our Students & Families
Nuestro personal se une para satisfacer las necesidades de nuestros estudiantes y familias

Pictures of our Teacher/ Staff Parade Included above. Thank you Staff who organized and participated!
Imágenes de nuestro desfile de maestros / personal incluido arriba. ¡Gracias al personal que organizó y participó!

div.h2: To Learn How to Install & Use ParentSquare Click on the Buttons Below
​Para aprender cómo instalar y usar ParentSquare, haga clic en los botones de arriba

King City Union School District Child Feeding Program
Programa de alimentación infantil
div.div:
​Beginning Monday, April 20, 2020 our child feeding program (for any child 18 years of age and younger) will be disbursing meals on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays only. On Monday's, children will receive meals (Breakfast & Lunch) for Mondays & Tuesdays. On Wednesdays, we will be disbursing meals (Breakfast & Lunch) for Wednesdays only and on Thursdays we will be disbursing meals (Breakfast & Lunch) for Thursdays and Fridays. Our pick up locations and times will remain the same: Del Rey School and King City Arts Magnet School from 10:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.
A partir del lunes 20 de abril de 2020, nuestro programa de alimentación infantil (para cualquier niño de 18 años o menos) distribuirá comidas solo los lunes, miércoles y jueves. Los lunes, los niños recibirán comidas (desayuno y almuerzo) los lunes y martes. Los miércoles, desembolsaremos comidas (desayuno y almuerzo) solo los miércoles y los jueves desembolsaremos comidas (desayuno y almuerzo) los jueves y viernes. Nuestras ubicaciones y horarios de recogida serán los mismos: Del Rey School y King City Arts Magnet School de 10:00 a.m. a 12:00 p.m.

font.br:
​The board meeting will be livestreamed at:
https://www.facebook.com/www.kcusd.org/live/
Please submit any questions to cmuzylowski@kcusd.org
by Tuesday, April 14, 2020 5:00 p.m.
​

h2.a: Free Internet for 60 days from Spectrum

div.div: Charter will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/ or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription and at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To enroll call 1-844-488-8395. Installation fees will be waived for new student households.

td.h2: Currently The ProYouth afterschool program is cancelled while our schools are closed. ProYouth will start back up when regular classes begin again.

span.style: display: table-caption; caption-side: bottom; font-size: 90%; margin-top: -10px; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

div.div:
The California School Dashboard, often referred to as the "Dashboard", was released on December 7, 2017. The Dashboard is part of "California's new accountability and continuous improvement system which provides information about how local educational agencies and schools are meeting the needs of California's diverse student population based on a concise set of measures."
To assist with understanding the new accountability system log onto
https://www.cde.ca.gov/ta/ac/cm/
​
To access King City Union School District's and our individual school sites "Dashboard" data click on the link below:
https://www.caschooldashboard.org/#/Home
